title: Capital Equipment at Oxford Physics
abstractText: To support the particle physics programme at the University of Oxford, as per Consolidated Grant award ST/K00137X/1.
findingsText: World-class research including measuring Higgs properties, CP-violation and neutrino mixing measurements. Research and Development for current and future experiments. Scientific knowledge for mankind. Research and Development on silicon and industrial applications. Aerospace, Defence and Marine,Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Education,Electronics,Energy,Environment,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology,Security and Diplomacy
